content: the power of a god cannot be overcome zanza this is the providence of the world even gods are merely beings restricted to the limited power determined by providence that power although great is not unlimited that voice alvz how dare you disobey me i am manada i was here at the beginning and i will proclaim the end but that that's impossible trok it is time for you to choose does this world belong to zanza or does it belong to you that is something i decided long ago we use our power to fell a god and andease our destiny it's faded the memory of a god's existence born from the chaos of creation it is
